user.title: ResMed myAir Login Information
user.description: Please enter the username/password used in the myAir app or website.

eu_details.title: EU Verify 2FA
eu_details.description: Enter the One-time verification code you received from ResMed to {username}.

error.authentication_error: Invalid username or password. Please verify at myair.resmed.com
error.2fa_error: Unable to verify 2FA. Ensure code is correct.

abort.incomplete_account: myAir Account Setup is Incomplete. Login to the myAir website and ensure that CPAP data is showing. Also, ensure that the Time Zone is set under My Account.
